item.description:
Divas Unleashed Halloween Pet Parade 2007

With the Salem High School Marching band leading the parade, followed closely by your Grande Diva, Erica Corsano, Emceed by WHDH Channel 7?s Randy Price, the 3rd Annual Divas Unleashed Halloween Pet Parade to benefit Canine Companions for Independence will be held on Sunday, October 28, 2007 at 12noon. Check-in is from 10:00am until 11:30am. Please register before the event by calling 617-426-7387 x221.

Last year, the event had over 600 humans leading 250 dogs through the streets of Boston. This year, with WFNX running (2) 30 second spots each day for the two weeks leading up to the event, Stuff at Night running print ads as well as the Boston Phoenix running print ads, we are expecting 1,000 participants and their four-legged friends.

Parade route begins at the DoggieDay Playcenter at 400 Tremont St, Boston and will end at the Band Stand on the Boston Common (across from the Loews Theater) The route is as follows; departing 400 Tremont St marching over the Mass Pike bridge, making a slight left onto South Charles St, crossing Stuart St. At the intersection of Boylston St, we will enter the Boston Common and march up to the bandstand.

We have 5 Boston Celebs judging best costumes in each of the following categories; Most original, Most outrageous and best ensemble (dog and guardian or group).

Our judges are our Erica Corsano, Randy Price, David Josef, Debra Mackenzie from Canine Companions and Jo Somers from Copley7 Model Mgmt here in Boston.

The $25 donation to receive a gift bag, march in the parade and be entered into the costume contests goes directly to Canine Companions for Independence.
item.name: Divas Unleashed Halloween Pet Parade
